This directory stores the libmysofa library from https://github.com/hoene/libmysofa written by Christian Hoene (Linux) and Piotr Majdak (Windows). 

SOFAlizer requires the files mysofa.lib and mysofa.pdb in the directories x64/Release and x64/Debug.

28.03.2022: Changed to the master version from 29.11.2021
03.07.2017: We use version 0.5(Windows) of 2.7.2017.
